availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hiram Sargent Powell (Poor Fork, Harlan County, Farmer, Representative)

body.p: Poor Fork, Harlan County, Kentucky, farmer and representative. Kentucky native. Married to Ann Powell, Calvin Powell, Emily Powell, Ewing Powell, Carter Powell, Araminta Powell, John Powell, Cyrus Powell, Rhoda Powell, Elbert William Powell. Farmer in Harlan County in 1860. Representative of Poor Fork, Harlan County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Digital Newspaper Program, "The Daily Commonwealth, 1863-01-30." https://kentuckynewspapers.org/catalog/xt7n8p5v7w3d (accessed December 07, 2018)
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harlan County, p. 95.
